ApplicationData.text: OITools module is a Java library dedicated to OIFits manipulation (load, save and validation)

package.name: nom.tam.fits
package.description: The Java FITS library (nom.tam.fits) has been developed which provides efficient I/O for FITS images and binary tables. Made by Dr Thomas A. McGlynn, HEASARC

prerelease.change: Several bug fixed related to ASCII character encoding / decoding and ASCII_NULL support
First official release : included in Aspro 2

ApplicationData.acknowledgment: This research has made use of the Jean-Marie Mariotti Center
